advanceTab.subTitle: How it work
advanceTab.title: Create a Job Description
advanceTab.desc: Effortlessly input your must-haves, nice-to-haves, and deal breakers. Fine-tune job requirements, including hidden needs beyond the Job Description!

advanceTab.menuText: Create your pool of candidates effortlessly
advanceTab.subTitle: Collect Candidates
advanceTab.title: Create your pool of candidates effortlessly
advanceTab.desc: Activate GoSourcer in seconds, create a group, and let the magic happen - relax or multitask while it finds your perfect candidates!

advanceTab.menuText: Put the power of AI to work for you
advanceTab.subTitle: Match Candidates and Job Description
advanceTab.title: Put the power of AI to work for you
advanceTab.desc: Let our AI engine analyze candidate pools and job requirements, delivering precise scores to match the perfect talent to your needs!

advanceTab.subTitle: Ranked Profiles by Relevance and Fit
advanceTab.title: Seamlessly add your perfect match to your pipeline!
advanceTab.desc: Simply reach out to your perfect-fit candidates and start building your dream team effortlessly!
